title: Guy that sings really loudly and is generally annoying

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Sing loudly and obnoxiously at someone’s house, hiding any feeback that they or their visitors receive

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-affected players are notified they were deafened and couldn’t receive info
-With the necronomicon, you shatter your target’s eardrums and deal a basic attack to them
